entry.title: Vitamin D, Covid-19 and You!
entry.content:
Post 188724 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: Hey this is framed in a kind of conspiratorial way that makes it feel like misinformation and we're trying to be careful around coronavirus related info. There are clinical trials related to vitamin D; maybe there's a better way to collect reliable info on where things stand on vitamin D? -- LobsterMitten
entry.summary: Post 188724 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: Hey this is framed in a kind of conspiratorial way that makes it feel like misinformation and we're trying to be careful around coronavirus related info. There are clinical trials related to vitamin D; maybe there's a better way to collect reliable info on where things stand on vitamin D? -- LobsterMitten

entry.title: Indian women most unattractive in the world: Richard Nixon

link.title: Indian women most unattractive in the world: Richard Nixon

entry.content:
Post 188710 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: It's ok to post about this article but the thread will go better with a different framing that (a) doesn't reproduce a bunch of his gross remarks right up top and (b) doesn't seem like it's offering "just how unattractive are different women" up as a thing to debate - contact us about reframing? -- LobsterMitten
entry.summary: Post 188710 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: It's ok to post about this article but the thread will go better with a different framing that (a) doesn't reproduce a bunch of his gross remarks right up top and (b) doesn't seem like it's offering "just how unattractive are different women" up as a thing to debate - contact us about reframing? -- LobsterMitten
